about_the_game:
Battle your way through a blight-infected world in this monster-filled, action-packed, 2D souls-inspired rogue-lite game.

Combat

  • Engage a wide variety of formidable enemies and bosses

  • Fight using combat reminiscent of the Souls series

  • Confront escalating challenges in infinite New Game+ story mode

Character Progression

  • All weapons are one handed, wear Sword, Daggers, Wands or Shield on any hand to create a unique build. (Shields are only left handed)

  • There are over 50 weapons, each with unique skills.

  • Apply status effects on any enemy, including bosses. Such as Bleed, Poison, Burn, Freeze, Shock, Choke, Shatter, Life Splash, Darkness or Light Struck.

  • Find tons of blessings, unique items that modifies your character builds.

  • Advance your character’s level to unlock a large variety of weapons, gear, and blessings.

  • Permanently upgrade your character and unlock additional options in future runs.

Map Progression

  • Traverse through 3 randomly generated maps. With unique enemies, backgrounds and random encounters.

  • Find random encounters that give unique rewards.

  • Find chests full of blessings.

  • Visit a shop where you can acquire weapons, gear and blessings.

  • Boost your health, mana or stamina by praying to the statue.

  • Use a blacksmith to smelt spare gear to upgrade your equipment.

short_description: Rogue Blight is a souls-like, rogue-lite, combat focused RPG. Fight your way through ever-changing maps. Customize your playstyle based on what you find. Meet other struggling heroes. Death will be punishing, but you will get stronger with every journey. Are you up for the challenge?
